title: Flourless Chocolate Cake
description: This flourless cake, featuring both chocolate and cocoa, is rich, rich, RICH!
author: King Arthur

steps.name: Prep the Hardware
instructions: lightly grease an 8 inch cake pan
cut a piece of parchment paper to fit the bottom of the pan

steps.name: Mix the Batter
instructions: Melt the chocolate and butter by microwaving and mixing in 30 second intervals
whisk in sugar, salt, eggs, and cocoa powder just untile combined

steps.name: Bake!
instructions: Pour batter into the cake pan and bake for 25 min

steps.name: Serve!
instructions: Remove chocolate cake from oven and let cool for 5 minutes
